document.full_text: the bayern board decided to fire the 59-year-old louis van gaal with five games left in the season after a draw at nuremburg dropped the team from third place in the bundesliga.
document.title: soccer: bayern fires coach after yet another stumble
lines_and_colors: the bayern board decided to fire the 59-year-old louis van gaal with five games left in the season after a draw at nuremburg dropped the team from third place in the bundesliga.
